text: Nowellia wrightii is a species of liverwort in the Cephaloziaceae family. It is endemic to Cuba. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. ==Sources== * Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Nowellia wrightii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Jungermanniales Category:Flora of Cuba Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Endemic flora of Cuba Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nowellia wrightii
